What does the OPTION_NFT_TOKEN option do in Verus?

The OPTION_NFT_TOKEN option, set to 2048, enables the creation of a single satoshi NFT (non-fungible token) that tokenizes control over the root ID. This allows for unique, indivisible, and verifiable ownership of the root ID.

ill publish prices
OPTION_GATEWAY_NAMECONTROLLER = 1024  // when not set on a gateway, top level ID and currency registration happen on launch chain
OPTION_NFT_TOKEN = 2048        // single satoshi NFT token, tokenizes control over the root ID
```
